name: Poppy Seeds
properties: Tiny seeds about the size of teff grain
Contains oleic acid and linoleic acid
benefits: Supports bone health with high calcium content
Contains healthy fats for cardiovascular health
May help improve digestion with fiber content
May help with sleep quality (contains alkaloids in trace amounts)
Adds texture and nutrition to dishes
synergies: Used as comparison for teff grain size in recipes
Can be sprinkled on salads and baked goods
Pairs well with other seeds for nutrition

quotes: TEFF AND BLACK LENTILS OVER BERBERE-SPICED KALE - Teff is a fine grain about the size of a poppy seed. Naturally gluten-free and high in protein, it is a staple in many East African dishes.
